reviews.review: все класс кто не верит тому в глаз

Although the gameplay mechanics are antequated, CSGO proves time and time again to millions of players that it can compete with big budget AAA games. CSGO is an underdog, which beats out high tech triple AAA games with a classic sort of ingenuity, resulting in good old fashioned fun. The feeling you get when you spray down 4 T's pushing A main, or getting an across the map AWP shot is unparalleled in any other game. The combination of strategy, skill, and teamwork fosters a sense of community within CSGO that makes players feel at home when they log on. I highly recommend this game to anyone even remotely interested... and it's free! 

P.S. Pls don't blow through your money on cases. cheers ;)
